name: TAS
description:
TAS, The Arcade Shooter, is a fast paced arcade shooter with 3D graphics, lots of upgrades and weapons, bullet time, some dumb and some intelligent enemies. Enjoy and have fun and don't forget to leave feedback.

CONTROLS

Use mouse to control the ship.
Hold first mouse button to disable ship rotation.
Press A to use berserk.
Press and hold S to use time warp.
